comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: Visitors to this photo page are encouraged to comment on this image here and then add their research/insights/comments about this image to the Inauguration project at the Flickr Commons group. Thanks!

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: Same photo hosted on Smithsonian's site has this caption: Bill Clinton, with the statue of Lincoln behind him , addresses the hundreds of thousands of people who crowded onto the Mall for the "Call for Reunion" a two-hour outdoor concert kicking off the Clinton/Gore Inaugural.

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This image has been used in the indicommons.org "across the Commons" post Inaugurations.

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This image was used in the indicommons.org celebration of Lincoln's birthday. Happy belated ;)
